title: Nerf kat more please
body: She's banned every game now and I main her. I can never play her anymore due to sudden popularity so nerf her more pls. Thx. Also why does this look like reddit now?

replies.body: Yes let's nerf one of the only Assassins who can actually do her job these days, and the fact the slightest bit of CC shuts her down.
As a {{champion:112}} main I wholeheartedly disagree with the proposal.   Buff Kat.

Well we ban fizz a lot, the ppl that main fizz dont give a sh*t
So if i were u, get another person to main @ mid

Im in the same boat, i love yasuo (just because of the playstyle and visuals) but he is so broken that everyone plays him and he was permabanned and it wasn't fun anymore, and now i feel like a %%%% whenever i play him :( so i know the feeling, also my main is Azir, i liked it when no one played him and everyone called him a %%%% champ but his popularity has spiked :(
Riot likely won't nerf her again for a while, I guess just wait for another meta shift so that her pickrate can decline a bit.
A Kat main asking for her to be nerfed. What do you propose Riot does to nerf her though?
The only realistic thing is nerfing her damage more. I don't care what they do, I never used to have to compete to get her in ranked
